Reviews.Title: “Great price for a 1 night stay”
Reviews.Author: HKicks311
Reviews.Content: stayed flight leave day drive cincinnati fine stay low cost special sufficient water pressure shower bed pretty nice wasnt hard rock lower budget hotels free breakfast perfect cereal yogurt fruit bagels muffins etc breakfast staff nice plenty parking free easy airport definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “You Get What You Pay For......And That Is Fine!”
Reviews.Author: bonvivantmeg
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights passing indianapolis hotel completely harmless beds arent 5star quality nor claim halls smell little musky unbearable 65night deal quick access indianapolis road didnt airport heard hotel offer shuttle believe free charge free parking nice decent continental breakfast pay bargain hotel definitely

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable for 1 night”
Reviews.Author: msditty
Reviews.Content: hotel perfect 1 night stay stayed am flight day clean staff helpful complimentary breakfast ones seen ready 4am offer park shuttle service airport didnt service resturant parking lot indy family resturant ate close easy 10 discount hotel key food fairly priced price stay compared hotels purpose exceptional stay travels indy international airport

Reviews.Title: “Fine for a 1 night stay”
Reviews.Author: vikesfan
Reviews.Content: found hotel acceptable 1 night stay relatively clean bathroom tiny tad bit tricky la quinta literally blocks gps directed instead correct hotel continental breakfast adequate breakfast nice clean noisy suggested previous reviewers stayed weeknight noisier weekends possibly overall fine stay 1 night passing thru indianapolis rate exceptionally 49 night aaa

Reviews.Title: “You can do better”
Reviews.Author: jaywalker17
Reviews.Content: stayed indy 500 weekend 3 cousins worst hotel ive stayed indianapolis id stay started paid time booking supposed nonsmoking front desk informed nonsmoking request nonsmoking apology ick ok bathroom door lock didnt slight smell smoke terrible beds comfortable towels worn found bug beds free breakfast little offer fruit cereal hard boiled eggs huge jar orange juice gone 830am 2 waffle makers dirty eat bagels wrapped plastic wrap meaning kept day day fresh ick noise thin walls people talking hallway sounded pool clean staff functional friendly location convient race track

Reviews.Title: “vegas trip”
Reviews.Author: kandvr
Reviews.Content: stayed aug 08 trip florida experience stayed jan 30th flight vegas nice clean breakfast ok special elses stay package leave car checkin flight time day schedule shuttle staff friendly courteous 20 minutes airport return flight indy 12am called shuttle told didnt time night call taxi hotel paid taxi 15 minutes time claim called picked wasnt bad stay

HotelInfo.Name: La Quinta Inn Indianapolis Airport Lynhurst
HotelInfo.Address: 5316 West Southern Ave., Indianapolis, IN 46241-5510
